column4: i have a dual boot, but i never boot into xp. its just there in case theres a game i might want to play
i have no problem with xp but it is old... and i do have problems with vista. probably later on i'll also stop using xp altogether... but will be good to know it's still gonna be there in my pc
yeah, i just keep it there so its there, but i like ubuntu much more, and havent tried vista yet
